title: OpenSearch container hanging hangs the whole CI job
body:
I just had a CI job (https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/actions/runs/5984369924/job/16235750639) cancelled because it took 6 hours and it shouldn't have been. I had a look and found the following:

```

```

For me there are two issues:
- the Docker container hanging but I'm not sure we can do much about it
- the fact that we don't cancel this thing and we end up with having the job hanging for hours before being cancelled by GitHub

@yrodiere @geoand not sure we can do something about it but I wanted to point your attention to it.
